name: Button Group
author: WPDeveloper

sections.description:
Button Group is a great way to create two buttons to be stacked together. Using this block plugin, you can create a Button Group inside your WordPress block editor and improve your website design without spending much time or any coding.

‚öôÔ∏è Completely Customizable: YYou can customize the content, colors etc. to make it suitable for your website design

sections.installation:
Modern Way:

  1. Go to the WordPress Block/Gutenberg Editor
  2. Search For “Button Group”.
  3. Install in 1-click

Old Way:

  1. Upload button-group to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Follow the Documentation
sections.faq:
Does it work with any WordPress theme?

Yes, it will work with any standard WordPress theme.

1.2.2 – 02/08/2022

  • Improved: update controls and structure

1.2.1 – 08/06/2022

  • Improved: Controls & structure

1.1.0 – 12/07/2021

1.0.1

1.0.0
